title: Best of The Dan Bongino Radio Show - Compilation Special 07/06/2022
description:
Dan explains how red flag laws and "universal" background checks are just tools to put us on government lists, Then talks about how cancel culture is cannibalistic, an amazing "elephant in the zoom" article, and the new parallel economy, finally he talks about the SCOTUS EPA ruling, "they don't jealously guard their power, they jealously guard their seat"
